languages.text: "Надеюсь, на нашем корабле он будет вести себя с нашими механизмами сдержаннее, чем ткачи Кровавой паутины — с членами экипажа".
"I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, на нашем корабле он будет вести себя с нашими механизмами сдержаннее, чем ткачи Кровавой паутины — с членами экипажа".

traits.locale_text: "I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, er nimmt mehr Rücksicht auf die Schaltkreise an Bord unseres Schiffes als die Weber des Blutgesponnenen Netzes auf unsere Crewmitglieder."
languages.original_text: "I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, er nimmt mehr Rücksicht auf die Schaltkreise an Bord unseres Schiffes als die Weber des Blutgesponnenen Netzes auf unsere Crewmitglieder."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'ose espérer qu'il sera plus prévenant avec la machinerie embarquée que les tisseurs avec les membres de notre équipage. »
languages.original_text: "I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."

traits.locale_text: « J'ose espérer qu'il sera plus prévenant avec la machinerie embarquée que les tisseurs avec les membres de notre équipage. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Espero que muestre más consideración por la maquinaria de a bordo que la que muestra la Red Sanguinolenta por la tripulación».
languages.original_text: "I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que muestre más consideración por la maquinaria de a bordo que la que muestra la Red Sanguinolenta por la tripulación».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの紡績工が私たちの乗組員にする以上に、彼が私たちの船の機械に配慮することを望む」
languages.original_text: "I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの紡績工が私たちの乗組員にする以上に、彼が私たちの船の機械に配慮することを望む」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我希望他能多关心关心这艘船上的机器，别像织血罗网的织网者一样，只知道夺走船员的性命。”
languages.original_text: "I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."

traits.locale_text: “我希望他能多关心关心这艘船上的机器，别像织血罗网的织网者一样，只知道夺走船员的性命。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I hope he shows more consideration for the machinery on board our ship than the spinners of the Bloodspun Web do our crew members."
